event.title: Why is everyone using Metatrader 4
event.description: Metatrader 4 has been launched into the market for more than a decade. Over the last decade, many new feautres have been added to tthe platform, and now its one of the most popular trading platform among the forex traders. The company behind the Metatrader 4 trading platform – Metaquotes Software Corp has been making changes to it year after year and therefore you can be sure that this software is going to stay and currently it has over 50% market share in the forex market. If you are looking to get into the forex industry then you definitely need to pcik up this sfotware for a trial run. You can get this software free by signing up with any of the major forex borker
